about_the_game:
Game Features:
1. The wonderful combination of three elimination, tower defense, strategy, cultivation and brush treasure brings you a new experience!
2. Strategic synthetic upgrade method, let you indulge in mental calculation.
3. The city has a variety of skill structures, intercepting the enemy through the layout, creating unlimited possibilities.
4. Rich equipment, weapons, free combination.

Game play:
1. Composition rules: More than three connected wooden armour people (the same kind of the same), synthetic advanced wooden armour people.
2. Three branches, free choice.
3. City upgrade and match equipment.

Wooden armour man introduction:
1. Assassin, short range single point attack.
2. Swordsman, short range straight line attack.
3. Warrior, short range fan attack.
4. Archer, long Range curve attack.
5. Hercules, long range round attack.
6. Lancers, long range line attack.
7. Fang Shi, remote gas Debuff.
8. Phantom Master, remote vertigo Debuff.
9. Doctor, remote healing Buff.

Introduction of the enemy:
1. Ordinary monsters, balanced health and speed.
2. Speed monster, fast speed, but low blood volume.
3. Split Monsters: The first death will split two monsters.
4. boss, horrible blood amount. New player killer.








summarize
"Making people to Fight Qin" is a set of three fire + tower defense + strategy and other gameplay of the individual sketch, you can build a variety of Mohist wooden armor people, formed different team linups, these wooden armor people can evolve to different branches.

Wooden Man
Each wood-armored person has an evolutionary tree of his own, and evolves to retain his previous abilities while gaining new ones. Each unique ability is script-specific, not purely numerical. These wooden armour people can continue to evolve and even reach hidden classes.

Equipment and talent
The city can also wear the same script customized equipment, different equipment, the combination will produce a variety of chain synergies, win the magic effect.

backdrop
The game tells the story of Qin in the Warring States period attacking Liang City with 100,000 "organ men" army, and the female master Mo Ji saving the city alone with the lost "wooden armor man" of 600 years.
"Wood armor" is driven by magnetism, controlled by magnetic tenon, and pursues flexibility, lightness and lifelike.
The "organ technique" is driven by the animal, controlled by the pivot, and used as a military tool in the war to pursue firmness and kill.

name: 我！墨姬！造人抗秦！

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 (2 * 2000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
